title: Navigate forwards to a mixed checkbox in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.

title: Navigate backwards to a mixed checkbox in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.

title: Request information about a mixed checkbox in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, read information about the checkbox.

title: Operate a mixed checkbox in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'checked'.

title: Operate an unchecked checkbox in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, change its state to 'mixed'.

title: Navigate forwards out of a checkbox group in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.

title: Navigate backwards out of a checkbox group in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate forwards from here' link.
